name: Hustletogreatness
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Life is built on large and small victories, we will call building blocks. Each block is placed one on top of the other eventually forming a foundational structure that will withstand life's unpredictable storms. It will eventually build to the height we call success.
Mike and Tina Serra will give daily updates that will encourage you to keep building your structure. With over 37 years of marriage, 7 wonderful children, 30 years of homeschooling, and over 30 years of business and entrepreneurial credentials, we hope our life experiences and
information will help in building your structure a little less stressful.


AFTER ENABLING OUR SKILL:
Just say " Alexa, play Mike and Tina Serra" or "Alexa, Hussle to Greatness" or "Alexa, encourage me with Mike and Tina Serra" to start listening. You will be encouraged and motivated to Hussle to Greatness.

Find us at:
